!Drake Exarion: Gran Kain and Antharas, lord of all scaled four-legged creatures of this land! What an extraordinary meeting! This child of the race of our tormentors agrees to go and recover my children... Thank you, two-legged creature! As you know, the *Leto Lizardman Warriors* have stolen my eggs.
